subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony scored 26 points, Allen Iverson added 24 and Marcus Camby had a triple-double as the host Denver Nuggets set N.B.A. season highs for points in a half and a game.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony scored 26 points, Allen Iverson added 24 and Marcus Camby had a triple-double as the host Denver Nuggets set N.B.A. season highs for points in a half and a game.
